metadata.title: CVE-2023-29950 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: swfrender v0.9.2 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow in thefunction enumerateUsedIDs_fillstyle at modules/swftools.c

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
